basic.init_simulation(fsettings, fschedule, ftemplate)¶

Initialization of :class:’efilps.depot.simulation.SimulationHost’

Parameters:

  • fsettings (str) – Path of setting file (JSON)

  • fschedule (str) – Path of bus-schedule file (XML)

  • ftemplate (str) – Path of template file (JSON)

Returns:

A :class:’eflips.depot.simulation.SimulationHost’

Return type:

:class:’eflips.depot.simulation.SimulationHost’

basic.to_simba(ev)¶

Output data to simBA.

list

class basic.InputForSimba¶

Input Data for Simba

Parameters:

  • rotation_id (int) – ID of rotation

  • vehicle_id (str) – ID of vehicle

  • soc_departure (float) – soc at departure of each vehicle
